Description:
Detects attempts to force stop the ufw using ufw-init

Author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Ufw Force Stop Using Ufw-Init
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%-ufw-init%' and command like '%force-stop%') or (command like '%ufw%' and command like '%disable%'))
